content.rendered:
The University of La Verne in Bakersfield supports the academic goals of students in Kern County through quality degree programs in business, education, and more. Whether you enroll in an associate, bachelor’s, or master’s program, you will gain a career-focused education that prepares you to be a major contributor in your workplace and community.

Flexible scheduling, including evening and Saturday classes, allows you to work as you complete your degree while small classes encourage close relationships between faculty and students. The campus is located in the scenic Park at River Walk, close to retail establishments, restaurants, and entertainment venues.

All programs are offered in accelerated eight-week sessions, with five academic sessions per year.

Bakersfield

Undergraduate Degree Programs

  • Accounting, BA
  • Business Administration, BA
  • Child Development, BS
  • Criminal Justice and Criminology, BS
  • Educational Studies, BA
  • Organizational Management, BS
  • Psychology, BS
  • Streamlined for Success, AA

Graduate Programs

  • Business Administration, MBA
  • Educational Counseling, MS with PPS Credential
  • Leadership and Management, MS
  • School Psychology, MS with PPS Credential
  • Special Emphasis Program, MED
  • Teaching, MA

Credentials

  • Mild/Moderate Education Specialist Preliminary Credential
  • Multiple Subject (Elementary) Credential
  • Single Subject (Secondary) Credential
